title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-1.3 - Social services agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-1.3 - Social services agencies

State Regulations

For social services agencies, these regulations govern
the following: (a) notices to be sent
to applicants and recipients of covered programs or services; (b) agency conferences; (c) information and documents to be provided
to applicants/recipients, or their representatives, who have requested a fair
hearing; (d) the fair hearing
process; and
(e) compliance with
fair hearing decisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
